result.title: codeforce problem in math section( Problem 710D)
result.content: Question link:( http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/710/D ) For the third test case I am getting a wrong output (test case : 2 0 4 2 -39 -37 ) . I reasoned that the number 38 would make both of the arithmetic series equal(please refer to the problem link ) hence the output is 1 however according to the test case my output should be 0.
